document_data.name: the Black Stag
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Stag''' was an [[inn]] and [[tavern]] found in [[Selgaunt]].
document_data.Location: The Black Stag was found in the southwest section of the city.
document_data.Description: This gloomy, yet comfortable, establishment was often filled with unsavory characters such as [[pimp]]s, [[smuggler]]s and [[drug]] runners.
document_data.Activities: The inn was one of only several places within the city that tolerated [[adventurer]]s.
